sentence.Network_en: The phone rings for the thousandth time.

sentence.Network_en: For the thousandth time , he relived the nightmare of his capture.

list.abs: The phone rang for the thousandth time ., 电话铃响了无数遍.
thousandth是什么意思... ... a thousandth ： 第一千 two thousandth ： 第两千 2. ten thousandth: 第一万 | 万分之一.
1/n 用英语怎么说_百度知道 ... Thousandth 千分之一 Ten thousandth 万分之一 one second 二分之一.
A dust particle weighs only a thousandth of a gram ., 一粒尘埃的重量仅有千分之一克.

entry.def: The thousandth item in a series is the one that you count as number one thousand.

example.ex: The magazine has just published its six thousandth edition.
example.tran: 这本杂志刚刚出版了第 6,000 期。

entry.def: A thousandth is one of a thousand equal parts of something.

example.ex: ...a dust particle weighing only a thousandth of a gram.
example.tran: 重量仅有千分之一克的灰尘微粒

means.word_mean: 1. position 1,000 in a countable series of things
1. the ordinal number of one thousand in counting order
